svg.text: Design System — New Templates: Detailed Specifications

g.text: The LinkedIn workhorse. 3-5 items, scannable, shareable, high save-rate.
Background: Paper (#F0EDEA) + ruled lines + margin line
Headline at y: 180px (below slide number zone)
Vertical centering NOT used — list fills top-down naturally
Position: x: 248 (72px right of number left edge)
Divider: Rule Grey 0.5px, opacity 0.5, between items (not after last)
Total per item: ~140px (3 items), ~120px (4 items), ~100px (5 items)
Auto-scales spacing to fit 3-5 items in available height
Authority builder. A single compelling quote with attribution. High credibility format.
Background: Paper (#F0EDEA) + ruled lines + margin line
Content: vertically centered at optical center (~43%)
Minimal elements: quotation mark + quote + rule + attribution
Position: x: 164, baseline ~40px above quote text top
Character: left double quotation mark (Unicode 201C or just ")
This is decorative — sits behind/overlaps top of quote text slightly
Role: JetBrains Mono 400, 13px, #D0CCC8 at 70% opacity. 8px below name.
Transition pause in longer carousels (8+ slides). Says "here's what's next." Minimal.
Background: Paper (#F0EDEA) + ruled lines + margin line
Content: vertically centered at optical center
Only 3 elements: part label, short rule, section title. That's it.
Three equal concepts in columns. Each has a visual marker (numbered circle), title, and body.
Background: Paper + ruled lines + margin line
Headline at top (y: 180), columns start 80px below
Divider positions: x: 450, x: 742 (centered in gutter)
Circle position: top of column, left-aligned (cx: col_left + 28)
32px below circle bottom, left-aligned with column
Max: 4 lines, wraps within column width (256px)
This replaces the "3 images + callouts" pattern. Numbered circles serve as visual anchors
in a text-only system. The consistent circle size creates rhythm across the three columns.
Two concepts stacked vertically. More breathing room than three-up. Good for deeper explanation.
Background: Paper + ruled lines + margin line
Headline at y: 180, items stacked below with divider between
Position: x: 176, acts as background visual anchor
The low opacity makes it a texture element, not competing with title
Position: x: 256 (80px right of number left edge)
x: 256 to 900, centered vertically between items
Headline to first item: 88px. Item height: ~180px. Divider gap: 40px each side.
Two-column list with check marks (do) and X marks (don't). Extremely high engagement format.
Background: Paper + ruled lines + margin line
Headline at y: 180. Two columns below.
Content area: 176-1016 = 840px. Two cols: (840-32)/2 = 404px each, 32px gutter.
Do header: "DO THIS" in #C83232, underline in #C83232 1px
Don't header: "NOT THIS" in #D0CCC8, underline in #D0CCC8 1px
Bounding box: ~24x20px, vertically centered with first text line
Path: M4 4 L18 18 M18 4 L4 18 (simple X)
Text starts 36px right of mark. Max 2 lines per item.
